title: I was excited for this... - BOOX Note Air
description: The BOOX Note Air is an e-ink device that is primarily meant to be used to read books and make notes on them, but it states it's a tablet and that you can create works of art on it as well. Not sure if it's iPad level, but Sarah decides to take a look to see what you can do with it. Also, she has two cats and a dog, so pardon the shed city.
